name: Angatra
damage_resistances: necrotic; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
languages: the languages it knew in life

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The angatra makes two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage, and the creature must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed by pain until the end of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Agonizing Gaze
special_abilities.desc: When a creature that can see the angatra's eyes starts its turn within 30 feet of the angatra, the angatra can force it to make a DC 13 Charisma saving throw if the angatra isn't incapacitated and can see the creature. On a failed saving throw, the creature's pain threshold lowers, and it becomes vulnerable to all damage types until the end of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Ancestral Wrath
special_abilities.desc: The angatra immediately recognizes any individual descended from its tribe. It has advantage on attack rolls against such creatures, and those creatures have disadvantage on saving throws against the angatra's traits and attacks.

special_abilities.name: Undead Nature
special_abilities.desc: The angatra doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.
